Hi anyone driving manual car here
What does it mean if your clutch suddenly becomes stiff. After long hour of drive and jam
U mean like hard to press down?
I just change the whole clutch two months ago
Last time my car also like that
Not sure is it because too hot
My mechanic say last time maybe pressure plate
That was what I was thinking
I was trying to climb out of CP parking lot  super steep
I was going up a slope
Mechanic say cos I always rest my left foot on the clutch while driving
Never apply pressure but still causes it to wear out
So is pressure plate issue already ah
Last time was my clutch line or something
They gave me a list of possible reasons why  then they went ahead to do checks.
Hahaha at the end it was clutch line ah
Your gear shifter got become stiff also?
Not really  just couldn‚Äôt find biting point
When neutral I tried to shake left right very stiff
Or everything perfect storm and broken üò¨

I think because I stalled a bit more because of that it caused the cars clutch to become worse
It was quite an old car (Vios) so not unexpected
But before this stiffness I stalled once
Then I was going up the slope
Best to bring to mechanic ah let them diagnose
Unless you want to fix it yourself
